author: Elastic
description: Identifies the creation of an AWS log trail that specifies the settings for delivery of log data.
false_positives: Trail creations may be made by a system or network administrator. Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment. Trail creations by unfamiliar users or hosts should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
name: AWS CloudTrail Log Created
query: event.dataset:aws.cloudtrail and event.provider:cloudtrail.amazonaws.com and event.action:CreateTrail and event.outcome:success
setup: The AWS Fleet integration, Filebeat module, or similarly structured data is required to be compatible with this rule.
